post_message: Donald J. Trump called Hillary Clinton's mid-debate bathroom break "disgusting." Frank Bruni says it's "the rare man-child who finds that worthy of ridicule." Read on in The New York Times Opinion Section.

commenter_b: Yes, no one was eating as much sugar in the ancient world as we do today. You can't in your right mind insist there was no tooth decay until the 20th century based on a small sampling from a small area when this "Mediterranean Diet" was the norm the world over. Ask any archaeologist. This article is using bad logic for clickbait.
commenter_a: of course there's no sugar in any of these fruits and figs and honey they were eating.
post_message: Pompeii citizens never used toothbrushes or toothpaste.
